title: Deals: HP Chromebase AiO now $160 off, OnePlus Buds Pro down to $120, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by an all-time low on the HP Chromebase AiO at $160 off. That’s alongside a new 2022 low on OnePlus Buds Pro and Samsung’s latest 256GB PRO Plus microSD card at $40. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: HP Chromebase AiO now $160 off, OnePlus Buds Pro down to $120, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: HP Chromebase AiO low returns following a $160 off discount. Plus a new 2022 low on OnePlus Buds Pro at $120 and more.
